verses.verse: <S%G2385>James,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G1290>scattered<s%> <S%G1290>abroad,<s%> <S%G5463>greeting.<s%>
My <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2233>count<s%> it <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4045>fall<s%> into <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3986>temptations;<s%>
<S%G1097>Knowing<s%> this, that the <S%G1383>trying<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> <S%G5281>patience.<s%>
But let <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> her <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> that you may be <S%G5046>perfect<s%> and <S%G3648>entire,<s%> <S%G3007>wanting<s%> <S%G3367>nothing.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of you <S%G3007>lack<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> let him <S%G154>ask<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G1325>gives<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G574>liberally,<s%> and <S%G3679>upbraides<s%> not; and it shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> him.

But let him <S%G154>ask<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1252>wavering.<s%> For he that <S%G1252>wavers<s%> is <S%G1503>like<s%> a <S%G2830>wave<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G416>driven<s%> with the <S%G416>wind<s%> and <S%G4494>tossed.<s%>
For let not that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3633>think<s%> that he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
A <S%G1374>double<s%> <S%G1374>minded<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> is <S%G182>unstable<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G3598>ways.<s%>
Let the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G5011>low<s%> <S%G5011>degree<s%> <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> in that he is <S%G5311>exalted:<s%>
But the <S%G4145>rich,<s%> in that he is <S%G5014>made<s%> <S%G5014>low:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> as the <S%G438>flower<s%> of the <S%G5528>grass<s%> he shall <S%G3928>pass<s%> away.

For the <S%G2246>sun<s%> is no sooner <S%G393>risen<s%> with a <S%G2742>burning<s%> <S%G2742>heat,<s%> but it <S%G3583>wither<s%> the <S%G5528>grass,<s%> and the <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G1601>falls,<s%> and the <S%G2143>grace<s%> of the <S%G4383>fashion<s%> of it <S%G622>perishes:<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> shall the <S%G4145>rich<s%> man <S%G3133>fade<s%> away in his <S%G4197>ways.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> that <S%G5278>endures<s%> <S%G3986>temptation:<s%> for when he is <S%G1384>tried,<s%> he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1861>promised<s%> to them that <S%G25>love<s%> him.

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> when he is <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> I am <S%G3985>tempted<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G551>cannot<s%> be <S%G551>tempted<s%> with <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G2582>neither<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3985>tempts<s%> he <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G3762>man:<s%>
But <S%G1538>every<s%> man is <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> when he is <S%G1828>drawn<s%> away of his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1939>lust,<s%> and <S%G1185>enticed.<s%>

<S%G1534>Then<s%> when <S%G1939>lust<s%> has <S%G4815>conceived,<s%> it <S%G616>brings<s%> <S%G616>forth<s%> <S%G266>sin:<s%> and <S%G266>sin,<s%> when it is <S%G658>finished,<s%> <S%G5088>brings<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>
Do not <S%G4105>err,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1394>gift<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G1394>gift<s%> is from <S%G509>above,<s%> and <S%G2597>comes<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G5457>lights,<s%> with <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3883>ficklenss,<s%> <S%G2228>neither<s%> <S%G644>shadow<s%> of <S%G5157>turning.<s%>
Of his own <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G616>begat<s%> he us with the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> that we should be a <S%G5100>kind<s%> of first <S%G536>fruits<s%> of his <S%G2938>creatures.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> let <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G5036>swift<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G1021>slow<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G1021>slow<s%> to <S%G3709>wrath:<s%>
For the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> not the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G659>lay<s%> <S%G659>apart<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4507>filthiness<s%> and <S%G4050>superfluity<s%> of <S%G2549>naughtiness,<s%> and <S%G1209>receive<s%> with <S%G4240>meekness<s%> the <S%G1721>engrafted<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls.<s%>
But be you <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and not <S%G202>hearers<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G3884>deceiving<s%> <S%G1438>your<s%> own <S%G846>selves.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> be a <S%G202>hearer<s%> of the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and not a <S%G4163>doer,<s%> he is <S%G1503>like<s%> to a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2657>beholding<s%> his <S%G1078>natural<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> in a <S%G2072>glass:<s%>
For he <S%G2657>beholds<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G565>goes<s%> his <S%G1624>way,<s%> and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G1950>forgets<s%> <S%G3697>what<s%> <S%G3697>manner<s%> of man he was.

But <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G3879>looks<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty,<s%> and <S%G3887>continues<s%> therein, he <S%G1096>being<s%> not a <S%G1953>forgetful<s%> <S%G202>hearer,<s%> but a <S%G4163>doer<s%> of the <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man shall be <S%G3107>blessed<s%> in his <S%G4162>deed.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G1380>seem<s%> to be <S%G2357>religious,<s%> and <S%G5468>bridles<s%> not his <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> but <S%G538>deceives<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> man's <S%G2356>religion<s%> is <S%G3152>vain.<s%>

<S%G2513>Pure<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> and <S%G283>undefiled<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> To <S%G1980>visit<s%> the <S%G3737>fatherless<s%> and <S%G5503>widows<s%> in their <S%G2347>affliction,<s%> and to <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G784>unspotted<s%> from the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
